column5: I was told to give Port Colborne marine a call as well as Proctor marine for boat/motor sales. If someone has a rep they would recommend to deal with at either place shoot me a PM.  Thanks

Hi i picked up my new boat two weeks ago  Call or email "Dan Smith" <[emailÂ protected]> - he is an awesome guy and tell him I refered you.  Small marine but awesome price and service.  Thanks John Cowan
